Description:
Won't Find This Size & Location Again!!
A substantial opportunity to construct a dream family home on this generous allotment of 659m2 this is rare block of land with 22.9m front is set within the exceptional landscape of the exclusive estate
A unique opportunity to become established for the long term in the beautifully presented highland Estate enjoying park land surrounds and picturesque river views this is the perfect location to raise a family
This gift of land is close by the Craigieburn Central, Splash Aquatic and Leisure Centre, Public transport, and abundance of schools both private and public, beautiful parklands and walking tracks.

Description:
6 Bedrooms of beautiful.
Stylish facade, and superbly located in the forever popular Craigeburn discover this forever home and delight in the quality and space.
Consisting both formal and informal living zones, guest's bedroom downstairs is favoured with ensuite and WIR, enormous master upstairs likewise. The further four bedrooms and study nook are serviced easily by neutral toned bathroom.
Wonderfully appointed kitchen with stone and stainless steel appliances.
Feature staircase, modern tones throughout, refrigerative cooling and ducted heating, alarm system, undercover alfresco and numerous little touches typical of a prestige display.
This is yours to own with a 7% return until handed over to you, at which point you can move on in or rent out easily. Display period ending around the cessation of 2020.

Description:
Spacious Living, Superb Location.....
Here is a wonderful opportunity for the growing family and investors seeking modern design and convenience. Nestled in the quiet pockets of Craigieburn this beautifully presented family home will definitely tick all your boxes. Surrounded by an abundance of local amenities such as Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre, schools, childcare facilities, restaurants, Splash Aqua Park and Leisure Centre, Hume Library, park lands, transport and much more.
The home offers:
# Over Sized Master Bedroom with WIR
# 3 bedrooms with BIR
# Rumpus/ 5th bedroom
# Massive Open plan (Living | Dining)
# Beautiful Kitchen with stainless steel appliances & walk-in pantry
# Central Bathroom and Toilet
# Separate laundry
# Double lock up Garage
Extra's Include:
# Evaporating Cooling & Ducted Heating
# Dishwasher
# Landscaping
# Alfresco area
# Downlights
Please contact Nada Hanna on 0404 804 542 to arrange your inspection today. Properties with this character & location do not last long. Photo ID will be required at all inspections.
*Harcourts Roxburgh Park Coronavirus Update*
In light of recent events, Harcourts Roxburgh Park have taken the appropriate measures to minimise the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak to our staff, clients and customers. As news concerning the spread of coronavirus continues to unfold, we are no longer conducting open for inspections and kindly ask that you DO NOT attend inspections, if:
* You are feeling unwell
* Have been in contact with someone diagnosed with coronavirus
* Have been in contact with someone who has recently been overseas
* You are under strict self-isolation instructions
* You have tested positive to coronavirus yourself
If attending inspections, please ensure you practice Social Distancing (minimum 1.5 metres) at all times, keeping in mind:
* Our agents will restrict the number of people inspecting the property to one person at any time.
* You refrain from touching surfaces, door handles, cupboards, drawers, walls, etc. when inspecting the property.
We appreciate your co-operation and ask that you please respect the advice and recommendations of the agent when inspecting the property.

Description:
Impressive Space and Brand-New Style!
This is a fantastic opportunity to purchase a quality built home in the highly desirable Trijena Estate. Situated in a popular and convenient neighbourhood with easy access to the best of Mickleham, this brand-new single-level home delivers a lifestyle/investment opportunity with its generous floorplan, quality inclusions and excellent presentation throughout.
Light and bright interior features four spacious bedrooms, master with WIR & neat master ensuite. Additional three bedrooms both with BIR, serviced by a main bathroom & separate toilet.
Add to this, open-plan family/meals area with a functional open-plan kitchen with 40mm stone benchtops, 900mm stainless steel cooking appliances including a dishwasher and ample cupboard space.Step outside to an ambient outdoor living area with a low maintenance backyard, perfect for all your entertaining requirements.
Other highlights include the comforts of ducted heating & evaporative cooling, LED downlights throughout, high ceilings, doorbell intercom system for added security, exposed aggregate concrete driveway, double remote control garage plus much much more.
Impressive convenience, close to local amenities as well as easy access to shops, parklands and major arterials.
Perfect for the first home buyer or acute investor-this one won't last long, enquire today!
Preet Brar 0416 085 144
Simran Khatrha 0431 178 435
In light of recent events, Biggin & Scott North have taken the appropriate measures to minimise the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak to our staff, clients and customers. * You are feeling unwell

We appreciate your co-operation and ask that you please respect the advice and recommendations of the agent when inspecting the property.

Description:
This is the One Double Master !
This picture-perfect contemporary masterpiece is a promise of tranquility, comfort and luxury. Situated on a quiet family-oriented pocket in Mickleham, you will find this executive modern but superior home offering designer charm. Beautifully zoned, the versatile floor plan emphasizes large scale gatherings with 2 light filled living zones accompanied by an inviting blend from inside to out. Located in the Botanical estate with access to the estates facilities such as a Shopping centre and oval.
Upon the grand welcoming entrance you will be greeted with a generous proportion formal lounge with a view to convert to a 5th bedroom. Be enthralled with an elegant and well-appointed kitchen equipped with stone bench tops, a butler's pantry, 900mm stainless steel appliances flowing onto the family room leading to a large alfresco.
You will find 4 bedroom accommodation comprising of an exquisite 2 master suite with a large walk-in custom robe and ensuite. Strategically planned a lounge/kids' retreat in the formal with 2 additional full-size bedrooms with built in robes.
Modern and easy to clean tiled bathrooms for your extra comfort and easy maintenance. A large family bathroom of equal quality and style with a pearly white bath, conveniently serves the remaining three bedrooms at the rear of the interior.
Last but not the least, decent size backyard, with low maintenance gardens delivering the perfect serenity for private relaxation or family gatherings.
Additional luxury highlights include:
Smart wiring
Infinity hot water
Ducted heating and evaporative throughout
Easy clean wooden flooring to ground level
Double garage
This home is absolutely stunning fitted with quality and quantity, inspections are a must!
Landscaping For Illustrative Purposes Only

Description:
Nice layout family home for sale!
18 Tussock Road, Craigieburn
Located in the Highlands Estate, a highly sought-after and award-winning community in Victoria, this 5-bedroom property boasts an impressive 650m2 land size (approx). This is a rare gem for both investors and home-owners!
This double storey residence features:
- A total of 5 spacious bedrooms with plenty of wardrobe space. 2 bedrooms come equipped with en-suites (the master bedroom upstairs and 1 bedroom downstairs)
- Downstairs is a fabulous open-plan dining area connected to the kitchen. This is also complimented by 2 sizeable living areas which can be utilised to fit your personal lifestyle.
-The fully functional modern kitchen is equipped with stainless steel appliances including under bench oven, gas cook top, range hood, dishwasher, bench tops, pantry and plenty of storage space.
- Outside there is an undercover alfresco overlooking the expansive and very well-maintained backyard.
-Upstairs rumpus room which can serve a variety of purposes, such as parties, games room and or any casual use you desire
- Extra features include double remote-control garage with internal access, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, separate laundry, security alarm and many more.
Current tenant is looking for a lease extension. If you are looking to invest, this will secure your rental income throughout the upcoming years. Through careful occupant selection, the current tenants demonstrate a fantastic history of maintaining the property with a high level of hygiene and paying rent on time.
This home is only a few minutes away from the popular Highlands Shopping Centre and other eateries, football grounds and hectares of parks and open spaces with walkways and bike paths.
Be quick! This is the perfect opportunity to upgrade or invest. Call and register your interest now.

Description:
Build Your Dream Home
The Phone Code for this property is: 27291. Please quote this number when phoning or texting.
Waratah is a boutique community in Mickleham. This picturesque community, designed with growing families in mind, is surrounded by 40 hectares of woodlands and lush parks.
Waratah is home to the Village Green where you can experience the best of active living and community events. This is also where you'll find planned leading edge early learning centre, perfect for families with young ones.
With limited land available, this is your last chance to live in the desirable Waratah community. All lots are titled, so you can buy now and build tomorrow.
Currently the land is fully fenced and secured.
Waratah's large 7 hectare sports precinct complete with proposed playground, BBQ, sports pavilion, cricket ground and three soccer fields are just few to mention....

Description:
Your own piece of paradise
Driving into your incredible 31 acres (approx.) along a tree lined drive of liquid ambers, you will never want to leave. With two kms of the beautiful Deep Creek surrounding your property of undulating land and views to take your breath away.
The sandstone home and red bricks combined with old timbers covers all your needs. With 130 year old Baltic floorboards, lead-light doors, sandstone brick fireplace with Conara. 3 bedrooms, 2 bath, 3 entertainment areas, including billiards room with 130 year old timber bar will keep all your family and friends entertained.
Character continues in the kitchen with a huge 5 metre handmade bench again, show casing the old Baltic timbers. All alongside your 900mm Lofa stainless-steel gas top/electric oven, and Fisher Paykel dishwasher.
Choose your entertainment area either at the house in a semi enclosed huge area to enjoy an outdoor TV, fireplace, views and BBQ, or venture down to your own creek with an enormous pergola made with old telegraph poles, complete with outdoor kitchen, pizza oven and sandpit for the kids.
Sit back and enjoy fishing, swimming, kayaking or bush walking along your path along the creek. Enjoy your own established orchard of olives, lemon, mandarin, apples, plus, grapes and massive walnut tree.
Your huge tradesmen shed (21x10m) will take your breath away. The 3 phase power, fully lined and insulated, bathroom, mezzanine floor and Conara wood heater will cater for all your needs. With another storage shed at the rear and garden shed alongside.
The choice is yours to enjoy the perfect lifestyle with either horses, cows, chickens, motor bike riding or bird watching!
*Inspection by appointment only, please contact agent to arrange a time*
Other features include
- Refrigerated heating & cooling
- Security system
- Solar electricity
- Solar hot water
- 1 dam
- Large chicken pen
- 1 x 36,000L water tank
- 1 X 21,000L water tank
- 1 x 2,000L water tank
- Aviary
- 4 minutes to Mickleham Primary School
- 8 Minutes to Craigieburn Central
- 11 Minutes to Tullamarine Airport
- Extensive garden
*We have obtained all information in this document from sources we believe to be reliable; however, we cannot guarantee its accuracy. Prospective buyers are advised to carry out their own investigations.*

Description:
Titled Block Just A Gentle Putt From Mandalay Golf Course
Situated only a few steps from Mandalay's Fifth Hole, this is the most keenly priced (dare I say a steal) block of its size in the very sought after Mandalay Estate in Beveridge.
This is a generous 490m2 allotment with a 14 metre frontage located just a gentle putt away from the golf course and walking trails. This titled block is perfectly situated for building your dream home. With fencing in place and council rates paid up to date it is ready to go.
Well known for resort style living with facilities including the Peter Thompson designed Mandalay Golf Course plus clubhouse bar, restaurant and cafe; residents have exclusive access to the heated outdoor swimming pool and state of the art gym.
Nearby Beveridge, Wallan and Craigieburn all offer a number of both primary and secondary schools. Three of the region's leading private colleges, Assumption College, Kilmore International School and Hume Anglican Grammar are all within an easy drive.
Beveridge is less than 50 minutes' drive to Melbourne's CBD via the Hume Freeway or by V-Line train and also is within close proximity to Tullamarine Airport.

Description:
PERIOD STYLE PERFECTION!
In a blissfully quiet family-focused neighbourhood, this freestanding home is sure to leave a lasting impression with its generous design, immaculate presentation & central location to all of Craigieburn's facilities.
Beyond the gorgeous period-inspired facade, discover an impeccable interior comprising 3 bedrooms (master with walk in robe & private ensuite), equally stylish main bathroom & separate WC, light-filled open living/dining area accompanied by a well-appointed kitchen with stainless steel cooking appliances.
Perfect for the all seasons entertainer, step outside and discover an amazing pergola setting, beautifully landscaped gardens and a sense of relief that all the money has been spent on absolutely everything!
Other stand out features include; high ceilings, ducted heating & powerful split-system air-conditioning, full-size laundry, lock up garage and so much more!
Immediate access to a broad range of lifestyle attractions including public transport, popular primary & secondary schools, trails & parkland, as well as Craigieburn Central shopping centre & only a meters away from Craigieburn Golf Club.

Description:
LIMITLESS IMAGINATION & UNLIMITED POTENTIAL
Sahil Kakar & The Eleet are proud to present this very rare, one of a kind opportunity in Craigieburn located close to Mt Ridley View Point, metres away from Hume Anglican Grammar School.
This opportunity provides a lucky buyer 1000sqm (approx) allotment to build a home of your choice and have substantial space for a pool, shed or even a bigger outdoor area for entertainment. Dream homes & a desired location are a rare blend, intertwine that with a prefect rectangular block to unlock this unthinkable potential.
Breathtaking views, remarkable size , amenities & schools nearby will provide any family an ideal lifestyle.
Your cluster will contain spec homes surrounded by beauty, nature & topping it up would be the city skyline.
Inspect this once in a lifetime opportunity to enjoy all the benefits this land and location has to offer.
Other points of interest- 35 Kms to the city, 20 Kms to the airport, 2.5 Kms to highland shopping centre & 3.5 Kms to Craigieburn station.
Contact Sahil On 0401 926 466 to turn your dreams into reality.
Expression of Interest closes on 09/10/20

Description:
Brand New Bespoke Home!
Sure to make an impression that lasts, this luxurious architecturally designed BRAND NEW family home is well situated within the Merrifield Estate.
A flowing floor plan enriched with high ceilings and premium inclusions on offer are great sized bedrooms, HUGE master with double vanity ensuite and walk in robe, a well-appointed kitchen with stone bench tops, Stainless steel appliances adjoining to the open plan meals and family area along with a low maintenance alfresco area with landscaped gardens.
A Long list of other extras include a double garage, ducted heating & refrigerated cooling, quality window furnishings, chic light fittings, security alarm system, double block blinds & floor to ceiling shear curtains.
Within close proximity to local amenities such as parkland, Kool Kidz Childcare & café's, Merrifield is one of the fastest growing master planned communities in Victoria, with a diverse array of new amenity and infrastructure planned and dedicated to delivering it on time and to the highest quality.

Description:
A Contemporary Masterpiece
This exclusively prestigious modern home was designed for comfort & luxury offering the highest level of style and quality imaginable. Located across the road from shopping centre and all amenities, schools and transport a stones throw away.
The spacious kitchen/meals/living area comprises of quality S/S appliances including dishwasher & stone benches. The lovely staircase leads up to the magnificent master bedroom with ensuite & walk in robe. Other 2 bedrooms include mirrored BIR's and their very own central bathroom. Fourth bedroom with mirrored BIR downstairs and powder room.
Added extras of this home include ducted heating, air conditioning, ducted vacuum, alarm system, a large double remote garage with internal access and landscaped low maintenance front yard & backyard.
Currently tenanted and would make an ideal investment or vacant possession also available.

Description:
Grand Living in a Prestigious Locale!
Sitting on 651sqm allotment & located in the one of the most prestigious pocket in Roxburgh Heights with close proximity to all your major amenities and easy access to Somerton Road. This grand elevated single storey dwelling offering space & luxury for the growing family to enjoy.
Comprising of grand entrance with High ceilings & timber floors running throughout with multiple living zones including formal lounge & formal dining, great size kitchen that over looks family & meals area capturing a lot of natural light with access to a massive outdoor timber decking entertaining area, separate rumpus, 5 good size bedrooms (master with full ensuite & all with BIRs), central bathroom, separate toilet, spacious laundry, side driveway leading to a double car garage.
Fixtures & fittings including: ducted heating, evaporative cooling, 2xsplit systems, solar system, alarm system, curtains, blinds, kitchen appliances, dishwasher and much more.
*Harcourts Roxburgh Park Coronavirus Update*
In light of recent events, Harcourts Roxburgh Park have taken the appropriate measures to minimise the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak to our staff, clients and customers. As news concerning the spread of coronavirus continues to unfold, we are no longer conducting open for inspections and kindly ask that you DO NOT attend inspections, if:
* You are feeling unwell
* Have been in contact with someone diagnosed with coronavirus
* Have been in contact with someone who has recently been overseas
* You are under strict self-isolation instructions
* You have tested positive to coronavirus yourself
If attending inspections, please ensure you practice Social Distancing (minimum 1.5 metres) at all times, keeping in mind:
* Our agents will restrict the number of people inspecting the property to one person at any time.
* You refrain from touching surfaces, door handles, cupboards, drawers, walls, etc. when inspecting the property.
We appreciate your co-operation and ask that you please respect the advice and recommendations of the agent when inspecting the property.

Description:
Outstanding designer home.
This impressive contemporary home has been meticulously designed and must be seen to be believed. Comprising four large bedrooms; including main with ensuite and spacious dressing room. The modern kitchen features stone benchtops, feature lighting and walk in pantry while overlooking the sun filled living area and enclosed alfresco complete with heating. The home boasts elegant internal décor including window furnishings, epoxy floor and with 2.7m high ceilings the home is grand and inviting.
Step outside and the long list of features continue - three car garage with rear roller door, separate side access (perfect for the caravan), security camera system plus low maintenance established landscaped front and rear gardens. This trendy residence successfully combines comfort and practicality to provide an exceptional home.
Nearby cycling and walking trails enhance the lifestyle options available plus exclusive access to the Mandalay Estate club offering gym, pool and tennis courts make this home the epitome of stylish resort living. Call today to arrange an inspection.
